name: Hyper Blitz
description:
A Game Made By Christian Yngvesson

May 26, 2016 Update: Version 1.01 is released! Changes and updates based on feedback. Check out the change log for more details.

Hyper Blitz Defend humanity as the last fighter pilot of your battle fleet in this retro arcade shoot 'em up game. Make your way through as many enemy waves as possible and enter the hall of fame!

Features - Arcade style action-packed gameplay
- S-Rank System: The better you perform, the more points you score
- Leaderboard: Only the greatest of pilots may enter
- Various collectable Power Up abilities
- Infinite waves of ever-increasing difficulty

Controls Keyboard
Arrow Keys or ASDW: Move
Shift or J: Shoot
Space or I: Missile Barrage
P: Pause
M: Disable Music

Mouse
Left Button: Shoot
Middle Button: Missile Barrage

Enjoy! Let me know what you think in the comments below or poke me at Twitter!
